title: Chapter 3 1. For a full discussion of the origins of the League and its reputation
The League of the Aitolians, in particular chapters

The League of the Aitolians is a much needed attempt to rehabilitate the Aetolians’ reputation, though, as with all such efforts, it perhaps goes too far the other way. For examples of modern historians’ bias against the Aetolians, see F.W. Walbank, The Hellenistic World
